properties.name: application.security.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: The secret key used for JWT authentication in the application

properties.name: application.security.jwt.expiration
properties.description: The expiration time for JWT tokens in the application

properties.name: application.security.jwt.refresh-token.expiration
properties.description: The expiration time for refresh tokens in the application

properties.name: spring.mail.base-url
properties.description: The base URL for sending emails in the application

properties.name: application.security.jwt.refresh-token.expiration-remember-me
properties.description: The expiration time for remember me refresh tokens in the application

properties.name: application.aws.region
properties.description: The AWS region used in the application

properties.name: application.aws.access-key
properties.description: The access key for AWS services in the application

properties.name: application.aws.secret-key
properties.description: The secret key for AWS services in the application

properties.name: application.aws.s3.buckets.dev
properties.description: The name of the development S3 bucket in AWS

properties.name: spring.mail.from
properties.description: The email address used as the 'from' address in outgoing emails

properties.name: application.url.base
properties.description: The base URL of the application
